page.title: 17EVENTS
page.content: Each July the miners of Durham hold their Gala.On the platform this year were{Neil Kinnock (Labour leader) {,Arthur Scargill (NUM leader and the {president of the coalboard) and Tony Benn.There was a parade with banners from the miners.There were shows,stalls such as coconut stalls,a bouncy castle.Twenty years ago there was over a hundred and twenty banners marched through Durham,but now there is only about nine banners.At the big meeting there are always a lot of shows.After the closure of the Kelloe pit some peoples dads have been transfered to other pits around the area.One persons dad has been transfered to the Philadelphia workshops in Crook.Another persons dad has been transfered to Seaham.
